query:
SELECT
                COALESCE(at.agent_name, 'Unknown') as agent_name,
                COUNT(*) as count
            FROM mcp_tool_executions mte
            LEFT JOIN agent_tasks at ON mte.task_id = at.task_id
            WHERE mte.started_at >= NOW() - ($1 || ' hours')::INTERVAL
            GROUP BY at.agent_name
            ORDER BY count DESC
            LIMIT $2
